div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 06:35 am CDT

div.div: Showers. High near 50. Breezy, with a north wind 15 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New precipitation amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Showers likely, mainly before 11pm. Cloudy, then gradually becoming partly cloudy, with a low around 43. Breezy, with a north wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 59. Breezy, with a north wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph.

Softball Cancellation
The March 23rd @ Hononegah has been cancelled due to their district cancelling all extra curricular activities.
